name: Hunting with Dad
description:
BRAND NEW HUNTING EXPERIANCE

Experience hunting like never before in Hunting with Dad! The game is a fast paced take on hunting with quick and understandable onboarding. Its the perfect first step into hunting!

MAGICAL ABILITES!

Hunt to gain hearts and give them to Dad! He will reward you with magical abilites that will help you along your journey.

BEAT THE BOSS!

Before ending your journey you will be faced with one last challenge, the boss. Defeat him using everything you've learned and become the best hunter.

EXPLORE

Explore the hand made map and make sure to keep your eye sharp, there may be some secrets.
